      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030106</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los gases</string>
            <string language="en">Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέρια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir qué gases son biomoléculas, dónde se ubican en los seres vivos y que funciones biológicas pueden otorgar.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must discover what gases are biomolecules, where they are found in living beings and what biological functions they fulfil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gases</string>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, welche Gase Biomoleküle sind, wo sie in lebenden Wesen gefunden
werden und welche biologische Funktionen sie erfüllen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir quels gaz sont des biomolécules, où ils sont trouvés 
dans les êtres vivants et quels fonctions biologiques ils accomplis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve descobrir que 
gáses são biomolecules, onde são encontrados em seres vivos e que 
funções biológicas cumprem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che gas 
sono biomolecole, dove sono trovati in esseri viventi e che funzioni 
biologiche compio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
ποια αέρια είναι βιομόρια, όπου βρίσκονται στα ζωντανά οντα και 
ποιες βιολογικές λειτουργίες εκπληρώνουν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gáses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
